column5: or is the weather too crappy?  i dont think the salmon would be biting today...
A day on the water is always worth it!  Check your local forecast for safety reasons before heading out.
Bright body baits dude. Get on 'em

Ummmm...Hello,its always worth going salmon fishing on lake ontario!!!!!!...theres always great fishing to be had 12 months of the year,the salmon will hit anytime,its a big lake with enless opertunities man go get em !!!!
just got back  i have no idea how to catch fish apparently.

actually, i think i was dragging a coho for a couple klicks, i was shooting the poop and i heard a flop, i look over and there's a lil chrome on the surface, i start reeling and it somehow falls off. pretty dissapointing.  was fishing 60-70 FOW between 20-40 feet down. using chartrueuse black ladder spoons/   haven't had any bites off the dipsy's this year at all
MY GOD!!!!!!!    An honest angler  How rare is that  We all get it wrong some days. We just try to come up with lots of excuses first.
Always remember......experience is a collection of mistakes. Regardless of the activity, one cannot improve untill one has mistakes that are learned from.
